name: Turban Blueprint
description: Round hat. It makes users look cuter.

name: Turban [1]
description: Round hat. It makes users look cuter.

name: Turkey Feast Gift Box
description: The roasted turkey can be smelt through the box! Open to obtain 5x Turkey Feast, and randomly obtain one of the following: Seed of Mastela ×1, Valkyrie's Gift ×1, Gold Medal ×1, Mora Coin ×2, Honor Proof ×50.

name: Turkey Grr Blueprint
description: A decoration made of turkey feathers will have a gradual color when heated, giving off dazzling brilliance.

name: Twilight Captain Cap
description: The hat of Sage Siren, it's been said that only the warrior can wear it.

name: Twilight Captain Cap Drawing
description: The hat of Sage Siren, it's been said that only the warrior can wear it.

name: Twin Katana
description: The legendary Gemini Sword cast by famous eastern artisan, forged with beautiful and gorgeous patterns. Witnesses said: the wearer's own movement would be as light as sakura.

name: Two-Handed Axe [1]
description: A very powerful Two-Handed Axe. The combination of its weight and acceleration causes very destructive damage.

name: Two-Handed Axe [2]
description: A very powerful Two-Handed Axe. The combination of its weight and acceleration causes very destructive damage.

name: Tyrfing Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Tyrfing. By collecting rare materials and more debris, with ancient knowledge and legendary Mr. Dragon's skills, you may restore it to the original form.

name: Tyrfing [2]
description: King Nassi used this sword in his holy war. He used it to sever the heads of innumerable monsters.

name: Tyrfing2[2]
description: King Nassi used this sword in his holy war. He used it to sever the heads of innumerable monsters.

name: Tyrfing3[2]
description: King Nassi used this sword in his holy war. He used it to sever the heads of innumerable monsters.

name: Ulle's Cap
description: Wool hat used by God of Hunting, Wooler. It seems quite easy to catch any animals in the field by wearing this hat.

name: Ulle's Cap [1]
description: Wool hat used by God of Hunting, Wooler. It seems quite easy to catch any animals in the field by wearing this hat.

name: Ulle's Cap [1] Blueprint
description: Wool hat used by God of Hunting, Wooler. It seems quite easy to catch any animals in the field by wearing this hat.

name: Ultimate Crown
description: The king's crown made of pure gold, engraved with divine inscription "to the King of Man", was presented by Odin to the heroic leaders in human history who transcended state and class. The last choice was Thanatos, the demon swordsman, who was bathed in the glow of dawn with an unknown sword in his hand. He fought against the Demon King, Morroc, for the hope of all human beings. He showed the world what is great with his extraordinary power and broad mind.

name: Ultraman Energy Food
description: Special food from Nebula M78 Gain double Base and Job Exp from killing monsters for 1 hour after use! (Buff’s remaining time elapses when you’re dead and when you’re out of combat but not when you’re offline)

name: Ultraman Forever
description: Officially Authorized! Ultraman Tiga’s OP. You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. This item is limited. Don’t waste it~ [We all grow up eventually. Those heroes during our childhood will remain in a soft spot in our heart~]
